component.html: Completing this quick 3-5 minute survey will help Dieta understand your GI health in general. We'll ask which symptoms you experience, and what you've tried successfully or unsuccessfully to do to resolve them. After you finish, our system will process the results using an algorithm developed by gastroenterologists, dietitians, and data scientists to give you your first personalized recommendations. As you track more data in the app, our AI will improve over time and be able to give you more specific recommendations for how you can improve your symptoms with new diets, medications, supplements, or lifestyle changes.

data.question: Which of the following GI symptoms do you have?
data.questionSubtext: If you don't have any of these, select N/A!

choices.option: Bloating/Distention that improves with neither belching nor flatulence

data.question: What other non-GI symptoms do you have?
data.questionSubtext: If you don't have any of these, select N/A!

data.question: Have these diets helped any of your symptoms?
data.questionSubtext: *If you did not try any one of the below items, select 'Didn't try this' or skip* A low gas diet includes things like Beans, Celery, Carrots, Raisins, Banans, Apricots, Brussel Sprouts, Prunes, Cabbage, Onions, Brussel Spouts, Potatoes, Broccoli, Wheat germ, Pretzels, Bagels, Alcohol, Caffeine.

columns: Tried but didn't help my symptoms

choices.option: The low FODMAPs diet for 2-3 weeks
